data.name: My Furry Trainer
data.detailed_description:
STORY


My Furry Trainer is a small visual novel about a guy who starts attending gym right after the start of new year. He is full of hopes, motivation and is ready to train his body to perfection! However, it turns out that he is not the only one “starting the new year with a clean slate”: all good coaches are already busy with other clients, the only available trainer is a girl called Mia, who turns out to be a very strange person...

As usual, "My Furry Trainer" is a slice-of-life story with a bit of drama. Train with Mia, get to know her better, discover her personal problems and help her become a better person, just as she helps you!

FEATURES


• About 1,5 hours of content
• Exciting story
• HD fully original artworks
• Cute trainer!

data.short_description: A new year - a new life! This year I'll definitely start working out, I will achieve my goals! Now I just have to find a good trainer...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains mentions of alcohol consumption, sexual themes and dialogue.
